metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40606 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The gf_bs_write_data function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file in the MP4Box command.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40606` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
